title: datum_page
description: Page of documents to reference a quanta of externally-stored data

datum_kwargs.title: Datum Kwargs
datum_kwargs.description: Array of arguments to pass to the Handler to retrieve one quanta of data

resource.title: Resource
resource.description: The UID of the Resource to which all Datums in the page belong

datum_id.title: Datum Id
datum_id.description: Array unique identifiers for each Datum (akin to 'uid' for other Document types), typically formatted as '<resource>/<integer>'
